canWeUseCookies.p1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
canWeUseCookies.p2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

acceptCookies.p: You’ve accepted analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

rejectCookies.p: You’ve rejected analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

noscript.p: We use cookies to make this service work and collect analytics information. To accept or reject cookies, turn on JavaScript in your browser settings or reload this page.

timeout.title: Your application will time out soon
timeout.message: You have been inactive for a while, so for security reasons your session will end in
timeout.message-suffix: If you do not continue your application, you will have to start your claim again.
